data.text: Can the US and NATO declare, and enforce, a "no fly zone" over Ukraine and neighboring countries? Air cover in support of Ukraine seems vital to protection of Ukraine military and any hope for effective resistance to Putin's invasion. Sanction won't be timely or of use.
